evidence.claim: Star Billing Solutions utilizes AWS for cloud infrastructure to ensure scalability and security.
The company adheres to HIPAA regulations for data security and patient information management.
Integration with EHRs is mentioned as a core feature for billing solutions at Star Billing.
Support for X12 transaction sets is highlighted in the documentation for their billing services.
They employ FHIR standards for health data exchange in their applications.

icp.icp_reason: Utilizes X12 standards for healthcare data exchange and offers API solutions.
